column4: I know that you'll tell me I should use firefox instead, but I want to use opera. ok that said, on the opera homepage I can download linux versions, however there isn't a dapper version yet, last one is breezy. So what will happen/what can go wrong if I install the breezy opera version on my dapper?
If you want, I know Automatix can install Opera for you.
well, Automatix worked great for me to automatically install a bunch of stuff. never done it for opera, i'm addicted to my firefox extensions.
